actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Social Security Act to provide that every citizen and resident of the United States shall have a social security number.

summary.text: Provides, under title XI of the Social Security Act, that every citizen and resident of the Unitd States shall have a social security number. Provides for the issuance of a social security number and card to each child born in the United States or outside the United States to a citizen parent. Prescribes criminal penalties for willful misrepresentation of information required to be supplied under this Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Social Security Act to provide that every citizen and resident of the United States shall have a social security number.
